title: Wild Student Responses
description:
This week, Joe shares some absolutely AMAZING responses from students! From the truly bizarre to the slighly sociopathic, teachers hear it all, and on this episode we take a moment to appreciate the funny in the crazy things our students come up with!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
